exam.question: The republication of the poet’s most recent works will certainly _______ his national reputation.

answer.explain: enhance one’s reputation： 提高某人的声誉。 句意： 这位诗人近作的再次发表肯定会提高他在国内的声誉。 magnify： 放大， 扩大； strengthen： 加强， 巩固； enlarge： 扩大， 放大。

sentences.sContent: Good lighting will enhance any room.
sentences.sCn: 良好的照明能给房间增色不少。

sentences.sContent: The publicity has enhanced his reputation.
sentences.sCn: 这次宣传提高了他的声誉。

sentences.sContent: ...and other assignments over the course of a term better enhance learning and retention...
...the brilliant historic culture of the Central Avenue can widen people‘s vision and enhance their knowledge...
...Japanese listeners sometimes close their eyes to enhance concentration...
...It is about building better communities and organizations that enhance us as individuals and reinforce our shared humanity...

words.tran: [遗] 增强子；强化剂；增加者

trans.tranCn: 提高， 增加， 加强
